name: MusicDataRequest.Error
desc: An error that the Apple Music API returns.

items.name: let code: Int
items.desc: The specific code for the underlying cause of the error.

items.name: let detailText: String
items.desc: Additional detailed information about the cause of the error.

items.name: let originalResponse: MusicDataResponse
items.desc: The original response that contains the error.

items.name: let status: Int
items.desc: The HTTP status code for the error.

items.name: let title: String
items.desc: A developer-friendly title for the error.

items.name: enum Source
items.desc: A representation of the source of an error from Apple Music API.
